body:
This branch adds basic Windows support for Spack.

This branch includes:

- Basic Windows support for most Spack components
- Getting started on Windows docs
- Spack scripts and shell support for Windows CMD and PWSH
- An updated Actions script to include Windows CI jobs
- Introduction of the MSVC compiler and Windows platform/OS
- Updated path searching and path detection for Windows
- Windows specific support for non Windows compatible unix operations performed by Spack (file system, locking, symlinks, etc)
- Updates to CMake build system
- Updated a number of packages to use Windows compliant build systems (moved away from Autotools when possible)
- Added Autotools conflicts with Windows
- Windows MSI Installer support and command line option
- CI generates a 'Spack Installer' for Windows as a build artifact, can be distributed to "just install" Spack on Windows 
- Test compatibility with Windows
title: Spack Windows support
